request.specialinstructions:
Three components to this event:
3:30-4:00pm - Trustee Meeting in Skyline - podium/mic, dropdown 4:00-6:00pm - Annual Meeting in Cahners - 8 headsets, dropdown screen, podium/mic, audio recording 6:00-8:00pm - Celebrate Engineering event on Pavilion - podium/mic with sound system, projector screen

A/V help needed—submitted on 6/4/18 Set up needed by 2:30pm and staff member is needed for event -Podium and mic -2 lavs (this was originally mics) -Audio recording of meeting -Powerpoint projection
I just updated this and it wont let me keep tech needed/tech for setup.

We will need:
2 headset mics (Yannis and Gwill) 2 handheld mics dropdown screen podium/mic audio recording

Setup along far wall of the tent (short side) with the podium/mic in the center, projector to the left, A/V mixer to the right (usual spot)
Laptop by mixer

This will be a smallish meeting. We will be using remote CART so we ill need a conference speaker phone will a few mics.
Call Nora x3102 w/ any questions. Thank you!

Meeting in the Engineers Enclave
There will be a presentation using the projector. Presenter is not comfortable/familiar with the system and wants to make sure that it goes smoothly. Looking for setup help around 9:30. Hopefully will not take more than 5 minutes.
Sorry. Put delivery so that they system would let me submit the details.
Seeking a speaker for lobby to play music during yoga class. Drop off only. Thank you!

Both projectors in use for this. Also due to the possibility of presenters coming in late with their presentations, it would be great to play a holding video during any awkward transitions while getting them set up. Requested a second laptop to use for the video loop (would a video switcher make the most sense here?)

AV tech requested for event, which will run 11 AM - 4 PM on the Pavilion. Soundsystem to be set, with speakers positioned both under the Tent and on the Pavilion. Please have a handheld wireless mic available, if needed for President’s possible remarks (NO PODIUM NEEDED, however). Please be prepared with your iPod and light jazz titles - client may bring their own playlist/iPod to play instead. P.S. Note another event happening on the Pavilion tonight, beginning at 6:30 PM.

6716/Visio-CBRE New England Summer Outing 6-21-2018 revised floorplan.pdf

request.specialinstructions: Hello this group will be here on 6/21/18 from 6:00-9:00pm in the D'arb suite for a Reception and Dinner. The Client will have been on property since 1:30pm and will have access to D'arb at 4:30pm. They have requested a Podium and Mic and well as to make use of the sound system for background music, which the client said she will be providing. There will be just a generic client check in for the sound system time (TBD) - you might just have to show us coordinators how to operate!

request.eventname: Harvard Optha. and Mass Eye and Ear
request.specialinstructions: More details to come - let's plan on setting a soundsystem for this event currently. Mic needs TBD. Will be in touch ASAP as details evolve - THANKS!
- Sound system needed in HHL foyer for iPod music - (1) handheld mic for remarks - Tech on site at 6pm to meet Maggie to make sure all is working.
We need to project an image onto a screen from a laptop. Youth Programs will supply a laptop.

We will need a podium and we will need to project from a computer and play audio in Cahners. We will also need 2 handheld mics in Cahners. We are looking to open the doors at 5:15pm and the event will start officially at 5:30pm. The event should end around 6:30pm.
This is a request for an internal meeting on Saturday June 23,2018 for Jeanmarie .... They will need a screen, projector, podium and mic.
Please arrive at 9:00am for tech set-up. We would also like two hand held microphones, and both of the projector screens down for the room.

* AV tech on hand for client’s arrival (6 PM for AV tech check-in) and actual event (6:30 - 10:30 PM - please check with Function Coordinators when presentations are scheduled and be on ready call in Skyline hallway OR nearby 6th floor conference room for those (once presentations complete, you can head home for the day - thank you!)). * Equipment needs: LCD projection, podium/mic, drop-down screen * Please prepare for sound in presentations* Function Coordinators to load in background music CDs; turn off during remarks

legacyfiles.legacyfile: 6717/6-23-2018 Sat. - Lahey-Susan Downer - Skyline Room event NEEDS SHEET.pdf

request.specialinstructions: Podium and mic with speakers, ipod setup in the tent

hey there! Much like the event in March and the one on 6/21, we'll just need a speaker dropped off for the yoga instructor's music. I'm not familiar with the outlets in the pavilion, though I noticed there was a wire on the corner. If you could help me determine whether or not we need extension chords, etc. that'd be great. Thanks!
